issue.title: [Plasma][Python] PlasmaClient.list doesn't work with CUDA enabled Plasma
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4246](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4246). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`plasma::ObjectTableEntry` layout is changed with CUDA enabled build: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/plasma/common.h#L97-L100
But it's not cared in Cython code: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/python/pyarrow/_plasma.pyx#L77-L78

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4246?focusedCommentId=16742770) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3398
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3398>
